item.description: R Markdown - ČŠŽ čšž This is an R Markdown document. Test ČŠŽ čžš. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document.
